column2: Guardians of the Galaxy: Best Story Ever (2015) #1
column6: It's not every day Peter Quill ends up in jai...wait...never mind this happens a lot. But he DOESN'T always get Rocket stuck there with him. And he DEFINITELY doesn't always regale the guards with the BEST STORY EVER! Let's just hope he keeps their attention long enough for the other Guardians to bust him out...
column8: | artist:Jacopo Camagni | artist:Iban Coello | penciller (cover):Tim Seeley
